alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 12:21PM CST until December 15 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze are expected. The heaviest snowfall accumulations are expected generally along and west of a line extending from Boise City, Oklahoma to Ware, Texas. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Cimarron County. In Texas, Dallam County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information. Persons should consider delaying all travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.
